114451.「伝説の通りですわ……。\n こんなにも まばゆく 光りかがやいて。\n これな:
It's just as the legend says. So bright and
shiny. This must be it!

114452.「神様……お願いですわ。\n どうか……。: Please God, I'm begging you. Please.

114454.「素敵な音色……でしたわね。\n ありがとうございます <pc>さん。\n 私の:
That sounded lovely. Thank you <pc>.
For going along with my selfishness.

114455.「もう 思い残すことは 何もありませんわ。\n それでは また後ほど……。:
I have nothing more to regret. I will see you
later.

114456.そして まもなく……\nシラナミとミナヅキの 結婚式が始まった。:
Soon after, Shiranami and Minazuki's wedding
began.

114457.「これより 神の御名において\n シラナミと ミナヅキの\n 結婚式を 執りおこ:
In the name of God, we now perform the wedding
ceremony of Shiranami and Minazuki.

114458.「それでは まず\n 神への 誓いの言葉を。: So let's begin with a pledge to God.

114459.「汝 シラナミは\n ミナヅキを 妻とし……:
Thou, Shiranami, art taking Minazuki to be thy
wife.

114460.「病める時も すこやかなる時も 共に歩み\n 死が ふたりを分かつまで 妻を想い:
Will you walk with her in sickness and in
health, and will you think of her and be with
her only until death do us part?

114463.「汝 ミナヅキは\n シラナミを 夫とし……: Thou Minazuki, art the husband of Shiranami.

114464.「病める時も すこやかなる時も 共に歩み\n 死が ふたりを分かつまで 夫を想い:
Will you walk with him in sickness and in
health, and will you think of him and be with
him alone until death do us part?

114467.「どうしたんだ！ ミナヅキ！？\n さあ はやく返事を……！！:
What's the matter? Minazuki! Come on, hurry up
and answer!

114468.「……どうやら 感きわまって\n 言葉も出ないようですね。よろしい。\n その想:
Apparently, you are so moved that you are
speechless. Very well. I'll use that thought
as a substitute for the words of the vow.

114469.「それでは 神の前で\n ふたりが夫婦となることの\n 証を お見せなさい。:
Then show us your testimony before God that
you will be husband and wife.

114470.「さあ 誓いの 口づけを！: Now kiss me with your mouth!

114473.「……お義父様。遅ればせながら 約束を\n 果たして参りました。: Father-in-law. I have fulfilled my promise.

114475.「約束だと……？ いまさらノコノコと現れて\n 何を わけのわからないことを……:
Promise? You show up here after all this time,
and you're talking nonsense.

114476.「しかも 神聖な儀式を けがしやがって……。\n この ドブネズミめがっ！ お義:
And you're ruining a sacred ceremony.
You rat! Stepfather! Please say
something!

114477.「そうか……約束どおり 借金を完済したのだな。: Oh well, you paid off your debt as promised.

114479.「ええ……。アストルティア中の\n キラキラというキラキラを 走り集め……\n:
Yes, I've been running and collecting glitter and sparkles in Astoltia, and have been diligently putting them on display at the
bazaar.

114480.「世界中を 駆けめぐり\n 友人のため 肩代わりした借金を返済する……\n まさ:
I'm going to run around the world repaying the
debts I've shouldered for my friends. I never
thought I'd actually accomplish that.

114481.「見事だよ メッシ君。\n キミの誠意は 充分に伝わった。:
Excellent work, Mr. Messhi. Your sincerity was
well conveyed.

114482.「だが……ひと足遅かったな。\n この通り 結婚式は始まってしまった。\n もう:
But you're a little late. As you can see, the
wedding has begun. There's nothing we can do
now.

114484.「ふん……。そういうことだ このドンガメが。\n ノロマな負け組のくせに でしゃ:
Hmm. That's what I'm talking about, you
dongame. You're a slow loser, but you're a
bigot.

114487.「よ…寄るなバケモノ！ それ以上 近寄るな！ \n う……うわぁぁぁーーーーーー:
Don't come any closer, you monster!
W-waaahhh!!

114488.「バケモノ……だと？ これは……\n いったい どうなっているんだ！: A monster? What in the world is going on here?

114491.「そのヴェールは 花嫁を幸せへと導くもの。\n 逆に言えば 不幸せを遠ざけるもの:
The Veil is what leads the bride to happiness.
Conversely, it keeps unhappiness away.

114492.「真実の愛を持たない花婿が 花嫁に触れると\n その姿が グールに見えてしまう…:
true A groom who has no true love touches his
bride, and she looks like Ghoul. I set this up
to test the bridegroom's love.

114494.「さあ メッシさん。次は あなたの番よ。\n 心から ミナヅキを愛しているという:
Come on, Messhi. It's your turn. If you are
confident that you love Minazuki with all your
heart

114496.「私……バケモノに……見えますか？: Do I look like a monster?

114497.「まさか……最高にきれいだよ。: No way, it's the most beautiful.

114498.「お父様。幸せのヴェールに認められた\n メッシさんこそ 真実の愛を持った\n:
Messhi, who is recognized by Veil of
Happiness, must be the one who is destined to
have true and real love.

114500.「メッシ君……。\n キミには 本当にすまないことをした。\n こんな私を義父に:
Messhi. I'm really sorry for what I did to
you. Unless you don't like having me as a
father-in-law.

114502.「もちろんです……もちろんですとも。\n お義父様！: Of course, of course, of course. Stepfather!

114503.「ふふふ……。\n じゃあ さっそく 式を再開しましょうか。\n いいですよね:
Hmmm. Then let's resume the ceremony right
away. All right, Father?

114505.「神の前で ふたりが\n 夫婦となることの\n 証を お見せなさい。:
Show us your testimony before God that you
will be man and wife.

114506.「さあ 誓いの 口づけを！: Now kiss me with your mouth!

120006.「……さぁ ミナヅキ。式の続きを。:
Now, Minazuki, let's continue with the
ceremony.
